posts.post_content:
Not trying to spam anyone - but it's much easier to do it this way. I've tailored the searches to only show the relevant items. I've made deals with a lot of people on here after messaging people on eBay - and would obviously prefer to sell to Net54ers, and with the addition of Sales Tax, I know both buyers and sellers are looking to go off eBay to complete a transaction. Also, I will happily never bump this again if anyone is annoyed by it. 


Just PM or email me at [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] with what you are looking for, or with what you have interest in. You can make an offer or ask for my best price. I'm not offended by price offers and will always respond. Offer me $1 for a Cobb and I will politely decline. Worst that can happen is that we disagree and go about our business, I'll think nothing of it. At bare minimum, you can assume to take off at least 10% and know that I will accept the offer. 

eBay Links: 

[URL="https://www.ebay.com/sch/m.html?toolid=20001&mkcid=1&_ssn=the_coop&_osacat=0&campid=5338812911&_armrs=1&siteid=0&_sop=15&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&customid=link&_odkw=T206+-rp+-reprint+-psa+-sgc+-sale&_from=R40&_trksid=p2046732.m570.l1313&_nkw=T206+-rp+-reprint+-psa+-sgc+-sale+-uncut&_sacat=0"]Ungraded T206s[/URL] 

[URL="https://www.ebay.com/sch/m.html?_ssn=the_coop&_osacat=0&_armrs=1&_odkw=T206+-rp+-reprint+-psa+-sgc&_from=R40&_trksid=p2046732.m570.l1313&_nkw=T206+-rp+-reprint+%28psa%2C+sgc%29&_sacat=0"]Graded T206s (PSA & SGC)[/URL]



Regarding payment - I prefer Paypal F/F but won't make a deal contingent upon it - nor will I add 3%. Pay however you feel comfortable, I don't care. Paypal is also [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url] - sorry for all the periods.


.
You're getting me excited. I may have to start selling on ebay again. :D

It's definitely all it's not cracked up to be. :D


Also - thanks everyone for the offers and deals so far - I will be out of commission today. I am involved with and singing for a memorial service today for one of my best friends that died of effing cancer in his 40s. Left behind a wife and 2 sons. 

[quote name="deadballfreaK" post=2233165]You're getting me excited. I may have to start selling on ebay again. :D[/QUOTE]
Thank you for the offers and deals thus far everyone, have been able to sell about 25 so far to Net54ers. They're all in the mail at this point, and hopefully some have already gotten their cards.

Again - truly not trying to spam, it's just much easier to tailor a search for what's in my store and provide a link - and I've been able to make deals with many people on here. Just listed a bunch more. 

eBay Links:

Don't want to annoy anyone, and won't bump this for a while. Just listed a bunch of stuff and am happy to negotiate to save everyone involved money.
Just giving a plug for Nate here; awesome guy to deal with; very honest and knowledgeable. I’ve done a couple of deals with him recently and A+++ experience. Buy with confidence.

[quote name="oldcardfanatic" post=2275575]Just giving a plug for Nate here; awesome guy to deal with; very honest and knowledgeable. I’ve done a couple of deals with him recently and A+++ experience. Buy with confidence.[/QUOTE]

Just saw this - thank you for that. I appreciate it.

Happy to negotiate with anyone. If you are looking for something specific, or a team, I'm happy to do the searching for you and let you know if I have what you're looking for.

Nate
